metadata.title: CVE-2023-52426 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: libexpat through 2.5.0 allows recursive XML Entity Expansion if XML_DTD isundefined at compile time.

criterions.comment: swish-e package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
cadaver package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
gdcm package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
coin3 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
matanza package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
tdom package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
smart package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
